home.title: Open Source Projects
home.subtitle: Discover the best open source projects from around the world
home.description: Discover open source projects created by developers, contribute and grow together with the community.
home.featuredDesc: The most popular and impactful projects carefully selected by our editors
home.sponsoredDesc: Open source projects developed by our sponsors who support us
home.noSponsorProjects: No sponsored projects available at the moment.
home.worldwideDesc: Innovative open source projects from around the world
home.sponsorsDesc: Companies that support this project and contribute to the open source community
home.addProjectDesc: Share your open source project with the community! You can add your project to the list by opening a simple PR on GitHub and have it discovered by thousands of developers.
home.step1Desc: Fork the repository and clone it to your local machine
home.step2Desc: Add your project information to the projects.ts file
home.step3Desc: Open a Pull Request and wait for your project to be published
home.recentDesc: Latest open source projects added by the community

projects.title: Project Collection
projects.subtitle: Discover {count} open source projects. Search, filter and find projects that suit you.
projects.scrollForMore: Scroll down for more projects ({remaining} remaining)

about.title: OpenProjects
about.subtitle: The world's largest open source project collection. For developers, by developers.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: OpenProjects aims to bring together open source projects from around the world, enabling developers to discover each other's work and contribute.
mission.description2: Our main goals are to spread the open source software development culture, promote developers' projects worldwide and support community-driven development processes.

realtime.title: Real-time Data
realtime.description: GitHub statistics with shields.io and contrib.rocks integration

discovery.title: Advanced Discovery
discovery.description: Easily search and filter between projects

community.title: Community Driven
community.description: This project is completely open source and developed with community contributions
community.content: OpenProjects is an open platform where everyone can contribute. We are open to all kinds of contributions from adding projects to developing code, from writing documentation to design improvements.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Contact us for your questions, suggestions or feedback.

footer.description: OpenProjects is an open source project collection platform that brings together developers and projects from around the world. Our mission is to promote open source software development and foster a global community of contributors.

submit.title: Add Your Project
submit.subtitle: Project Submission
submit.description: Share your open source project with the community and get discovered by thousands of developers.

step1.title: Fork the Repository
step1.description: Fork the repository on GitHub to copy it to your own account

step2.title: Add Project Information
step2.description: Edit the data/projects.ts file to add your project information

step3.title: Create Pull Request
step3.description: Review your changes and create a pull request

jsonFormat.title: Project Format
